Dear All,

Ginza Choshuya have a sword for sale that looks as if it could be a
prototype for the Naval Dirk, or perhaps an artisan-made special order.  Go
here to look at it:
http://www.choshuya.co.jp/1/0802/member_frame_sword.htm

You will need to scroll down to see all the detail.  I've reduced in size and attached one of the images to guide you - at least, for the list that accepts attached images.

Does anybody have any knowledge of this style??  It carries a respectable tanto blade signed  Sunshu ju Ikkansai Shigeyoshi and dated Meiji 2 nen 2 gatsu hori dosaku.

Best regards,
Barry.
